emuInput.TitMainTitle: Stokely Carmichael (Kwame Ture) speaking in Ebenezer Baptist Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 11, 1967, pg. 1 & 3, reads: "...Negroes of leadership status and plain citizens jammed Ebenezer Church to hear the controversial Stokely Carmichael, director of SNCC, speak... - Harris Photos"
